item.name: Astral Convocation Katana
item.description:
A magical katana imbued with astral power.
When you hit a creature, you leave the passive: "Destiny's Mark".
Destiny's Mark: When you can see a creature that you attacked before, you can use a bonus action to turn the gravity so heavy that the enemy must make a Constitution Saving Throw. On failure, the enemy is launched to the ground, reducing its movement speed to 0.
Concentration: When you hold this Katana with two hands, it slows the gravity around you, imposing disadvantage on enemy attack rolls.
